content:
We will be performing critical database maintenance that will affect our services.

üìÖ Timeline:
- Pre-maintenance restrictions begin: January 26, 2025 08:45 UTC
- Full maintenance window begins: January 26, 2025 09:00 UTC
- Full maintenance window expected duration: 60 minutes

‚ö†Ô∏è Service Restrictions (Starting 08:45 UTC):

The following operations will return 403 errors throughout the maintenance period:
- Creating sandbox environments
- Destroying sandbox environments
- Project duplication
- Project deletion

‚ö†Ô∏è Full Maintenance Impact (Starting 09:00 UTC):

Phase 1 - System Downtime (First 10 minutes):
- Content Management API: Complete outage
- Content Delivery API: Complete outage (cached CDN requests will still work)
- Admin Interface: Complete outage
- Assets URLs: Fully functional 

Phase 2 - Restricted Access (Remaining duration):
The system will return online with all environments in maintenance mode:
- Read operations: Fully functional
- Write operations: Temporarily disabled, returning 403 errors for operations including content updates, schema changes, upload management, all other write operations on environments.

We will provide more status updates during the maintenance window. 

Thank you for your understanding.

updates.content:
